definition: apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Meshes with vertex colors, normals and one or two UV sets.
sentences.chinese: 網格模型包含頂點顏色，法線，一到兩個uv集。

sentences.english: He did not want to be pinnacled.
sentences.chinese: 他出醜還沒有出到頂點。

sentences.english: Currently, algorithms based on graph cut take pixels as vertexes, therefore, real-time of segmentation is poor.
sentences.chinese: 由於加權圖的頂點規模較大，因此分割實時性較差。

sentences.english: It will be located on top of Mauna Kea, Hawaii.
sentences.chinese: 它將會放置在夏威夷莫納克亞山的頂點。

sentences.english: Three points must be specified for a corner curve segment.
sentences.chinese: 必須爲折角形曲線段指定三個頂點。

sentences.english: The blending weights can be painted per-vertex and are normalized automatically.
sentences.chinese: 權重的混合，可畫每個頂點，並自動歸。

sentences.english: This lets you interpolate any of the vertex data along the 3 axes.
sentences.chinese: 這允許你沿着3個軸插值任何頂點數據。

sentences.english: Will China's housing prices peak in 2010?
You can create your vertex shader in two ways (that I know).
sentences.chinese: 創建頂點着色程序你可有兩種方法。

sentences.english: The algorithm to apex of polygon is a new one when layout stampings optimally.
sentences.chinese: 多邊形頂點算法是衝裁件優化排樣的一種新算法。

sentences.english: Middle-click a vertex of the current polygon to remove it.
sentences.chinese: 中鍵單擊頂點當前多邊形將其刪除。

sentences.english: Per-vertex dynamic lighting can add significant cost to vertex transformations.
sentences.chinese: 逐像素的動態光照將對頂點變換增加顯著的開銷。

sentences.english: Optional X-coordinate of the top-left corner of the texture region to lock.
sentences.chinese: 可選擇用於鎖定紋理區域的轉角左頂點X座標。

sentences.english: An auxiliary mesh is introduced for vertex-centered unknowns.
sentences.chinese: 對於未知量定義在頂點的情形，引入輔助網格。

sentences.english: Obama will be the zenith of black America for as long as he lives.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬畢其一生都將成爲美國黑人運動成就的頂點。

sentences.english: For us, this is at the tip of a very large iceberg.
sentences.chinese: 對我們來說，這是一座巨大冰山的頂點。

definition: storm/violent commotion/fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)
on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
reversal/inversion/to reverse/to invert (upside down, inside out, back to front, white to black etc)
